  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:notna_gradiva/140056</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:notna_gradiva/140056</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Notna gradiva - Timp furlan</string>
            <string language="en">Music Notes - Timp furlan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik-Anmerkungen - Timp furlan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Notes de musique - Timp furlan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Notas da música - Timp furlan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Note di musica - Timp furlan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημειώσεις μουσικής - Timp furlan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Notas de la música - Timp furlan</string>
          </title>
          <language>it</language>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">"Timp furlan" je naslov pesmi, ki jo je napisal Pier Paolo Pasolini. Uglasbil jo je Albino Perosa. Izdana je bila leta 2002 v Trstu.</string>
            <string language="en">"Timp furlan" is the title of poem written by Pier Paolo Pasolini. The music way composed by Albino Perosa. It was released in 2002 in Trst.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zbor</string>
            <string language="sl">choir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pesem</string>
            <string language="sl">poem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mešani zbor</string>
            <string language="sl">mixed choir</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"Timp, das" furlan ist, ist der Titel Gedicht 
geschrieben von Pier Paolo Pasolini. Die Musikmethode bestanden 
von Albino Perosa. Sie wurde 2002 in Trst freigegeben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"Timp furlan" est le titre de la poésie écrit 
par Pier Paolo Pasolini. La voie de musique composée par Albino
Perosa. Elle a été libérée en 2002 dans Trst.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"Timp furlan" é o título do poema escrito por 
Cais Paolo Pasolini. A maneira da música composta por Albino 
Perosa. Foi liberada em 2002 em Trst.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"Timp furlan" è il titolo del poem scritto da 
Pier Paolo Pasolini. Il modo di musica composto da Albino 
Perosa. È stato liberato in 2002 in Trst.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Timp furlan" είναι ο τίτλος του ποιήματος που 
γράφεται από την αποβάθρα Paolo Pasolini. Ο τρόπος 
μουσικής που συντίθεται από albino Perosa. Εκδόθηκε το
2002 σε Trst.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">"Timp furlan" es el título del poema escrito por 
Pier Paolo Pasolini. La manera de la música compuesta por 
Albino Perosa. Release/versión en 2002 en Trst.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
